thread.title: Strictly star Carol Kirkwood is happy to stay single
thread.title_full: Strictly star Carol Kirkwood is happy to stay single

title: Strictly star Carol Kirkwood is happy to stay single
text:
Strictly star Carol Kirkwood is happy to stay single Strictly star Carol Kirkwood is happy to stay single 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Strictly Come Dancing star Carol Kirkwood says she loves being single and is not tempted by offers from her male fans. 
The BBC Breakfast weather presenter told The Sun she is enjoying her freedom and is not looking for a relationship at the moment. Strictly single Carol with dance partner Pasha (Chris Radburn/PA) 
“Sometimes you do get invited out by viewers but I don’t know these people that are writing emails to me saying ‘Let’s go to dinner’,” the 53-year-old told The Sun. 
“I’m very flattered that anybody would be bothered to do that but I don’t know who they are, so I’m not tempted to follow them up.” Share article 
Carol and her professional partner Pasha Kovalev will be performing a Viennese waltz on the show tonight. Promoted Stories
